message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $150.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand that $150 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer it to you for $135. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I'm still interested in the product, but $135 is a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $115 for it.
I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $125. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I appreciate the compromise, but $125 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to pay $110 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to give you a bit more. I can offer it to you for $122. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value.
I appreciate the compromise, but $122 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for it.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more compromise. I can offer it to you for $118. It's a great price, and I think you'll be happy with the value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $118 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $98 for it.
